Notes:   CD 1: Recorded live at The Las Vegas Hilton, September 4, 1972 Ã¯Â¿Â½ Dinner Show.
 CD 2, tracks 1 - 5: From RCA live recordings. February 1972.
 CD 2, tracks 6 - 13: Recorded at rehearsals August 2 and 3, 1972 at the Las Vegas Hilton Hotel. Sub-standard audio from cassette tape,
Press note:
 Re-live the experience when many Elvis fans from around the world saw Elvis for the first time in Las Vegas in September, 1972. Destination USA celebrates Elvis fans who traveled to see the king in concert during 1972. This 2-CD 7-inch set features the dinner show concert from September 4, 1972 and includes some never-before-released songs from the February Las Vegas Season along with rehearsals from August 2 - 3, 1972. 

 The 16-page booklet includes eye-witness accounts from fans who actually met Elvis back stage. Learn more from fans who witnessed the king's remarkable stage performance, all while sitting in the front-row, including 200 members of the British Elvis Presley Fan Club. All of these great personal memories are packed together in this 7-inch 2-CD release with several never-before-seen photos
 


Enjoy!

Jeroep

Thanks to the original uploader!
